function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in SARS-CoV-2 viral load distributions and respiratory droplet size distributions for various activities and individuals","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the risk of viral transmission and understanding how it varies with different factors such as size, age, etc.","Mitigation":"Research and data collection to understand viral load distributions and respiratory droplet size distributions for different activities and individuals","Technologies":"Data collection tools, sensors, and analytical models","People":"Researchers, public health officials, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the trajectory of droplets and aerosols containing viral particles under different environmental conditions and ventilation modes","Impact":"Challenges in implementing effective ventilation strategies to mitigate viral spread","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to understand droplet and aerosol trajectory under various conditions and developing guidance for ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Environmental sensors, airflow simulation models, and computational fluid dynamics","People":"Building engineers, indoor air quality experts, and facility managers","Owner":"Engineering firms, research institutions"},{"Description":"Difficulty in determining the risk and severity of infection based on viral exposure and deposition in the respiratory system","Impact":"Inability to assess individual risk factors and determine appropriate protective measures","Mitigation":"Research on viral exposure patterns and their impact on infection severity, as well as development of risk assessment tools","Technologies":"Biological sampling and analysis tools, medical imaging, and risk assessment algorithms","People":"Medical researchers, epidemiologists, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"}]}
